articles.title: Genstore Ranks #1 Product of the Day on Product Hunt
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Genstore, an AI-native e-commerce platform, achieved the #1 Product of the Day ranking on Product Hunt and trended as a top product of the week. The platform aims to simplify advanced commerce for small businesses by providing each customer with a personal team of AI agents for product selection and marketing.

articles.title: Brandjet.ai Launches to Advance Brand Intelligence With AI Sentiment and Perception Tools
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Brandjet.ai has launched a new SaaS platform designed for brand intelligence. The platform provides real-time sentiment analysis, assesses brand perception across foundation models, and identifies PR opportunities for businesses.

articles.title: SK hynix Launches ZUFS 4.1 NAND Memory
articles.summary: SK hynix has announced the mass production and delivery of its ZUFS 4.1 mobile NAND flash memory product, starting in July after June certification, with Google as a customer. This product enhances smartphone OS performance, reducing application launch times by up to 45%, and offers improved error handling, positioning it as an optimized solution for on-device AI.

articles.title: The Sony Bravia 2 II TV, tested and reviewed: A budget-friendly and uncomplicated home theater upgrade
articles.author: MORIBA CUMMINGS
articles.summary: Sony launched the Bravia 2 II Smart TV in April 2025 as an entry-level model with 4K X-Reality Pro engine for upscaling and Google TV integration. The TV features multiple HDMI and USB ports, and the remote control is made of 80% recycled plastic. The TV is designed for everyday viewing and excels in picture quality, vibrancy, and smart integration.

articles.title: Digital game
articles.summary: Partytown, a new framework, offloads third-party scripts to a separate web worker, improving page load times and user experience.  Prioritized script loading and shared storage ensure seamless functionality of platforms like LaunchDarkly, Adform and Rokt. This optimization aims to improve Core Web Vitals and potentially increase search engine rankings.

articles.title: You can still buy Meta Ray-Ban smart glasses for $76 off - here are the deals
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Meta introduces a 'Refurbished AI Glasses' store. The store offers like-new devices in original packaging at a lower price.

articles.title: 9 Verb Products You'll Want To Use Every Last Drop Of
articles.author: Becca Glasser-Baker
articles.summary: The article introduces several new hair care products. These include Ghost shampoo, hydrating conditioner, dry shampoo, curl cream, glossy shine spray, ghost styling primer, density peptide hair serum, volume spray, and a bonding mask. Each product has unique features and is designed to address specific hair concerns.

articles.title: Nvidia Unveils Rubin: Accelerating the AI Race with Annual Chip Revolution
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: Nvidia plans to release its next-generation Rubin platform in 2026. This update continues Nvidia's focus on innovation in the AI compute market.

articles.title: 6 Netflix Originals You Must Watch This Month
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Netflix is promoting its 'Netflix Originals' series. This highlights new or noteworthy content available to subscribers this month.

articles.title: Richard Branson: The No. 1 most important skill you need to turn an idea into a successful business
articles.author: Tom Huddleston Jr.
articles.summary: Richard Branson invested in Ring after being persuaded by the founder's vision. Branson is also promoting a new project called the "Doorbell of Dreams," where entrepreneurs can pitch business ideas using a video doorbell at Virgin Hotels New York.

articles.title: BuzzFeed Studios Relaunches Flagship 'BuzzFeed Video' YouTube Channel: Fan-Favorites Return, New Series Launch
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: BuzzFeed, Inc. is relaunching its BuzzFeed Video YouTube channel. The relaunch includes a new programming slate, the return of popular series and stars, fresh talent, and experimental pilots debuting this fall.

articles.title: Pixel 8 Pro: Huge Price Drop – Limited Time!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google Pixel 8 Pro experiences a price drop at Cdiscount, now available for €410 including a year of McAfee Total Protection. This price reduction signifies a shift towards making flagship devices more accessible due to increased competition, with Google responding with its Tensor G3 chip and integrated hardware and software approach.

articles.title: Amazon's Luna cloud gaming service comes to Android phones
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Amazon has made its Luna cloud gaming service available on Android devices. Users do not need to download a separate app to access the service.

articles.title: NordVPN Is Free for 20 Months, But Here's the Condition You Need to Meet
articles.author: Kotaku
articles.summary: NordVPN protects user data with military-grade encryption. It also offers a 73% discount, providing nearly two years of service for free. The service aims to keep users anonymous and bypass geo-blocks.

articles.title: Samsung launches new TV
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Nigeria launched its new QLED TV, named 'The Frame', at the Nike Art Gallery in Lekki, Lagos. The TV is designed to function as a piece of art when switched off.

articles.title: When Will Your Galaxy Get the Samsung One UI 8 Update?
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the One UI 8 update based on Android 16, starting with the Galaxy S25 series on September 18th. The update includes features like 90:10 split-screen multitasking, revamped Quick Share, and a smarter Samsung Reminder app, with AI enhancements throughout the interface. The rollout will continue to other Galaxy devices, including mid-range A-series and budget M-series models, through October and November.

articles.title: Boden's sale shoes may feel 'like slippers' but are perfect for office wear
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Boden has released a new tartan colorway for their Nya Penny Loafers. The loafers are priced at £129, but shoppers can use a discount code to purchase them for £109.69.  Customers describe the flats as comfortable and stylish for both casual and office wear.

articles.title: AI-driven startup Digital Rocket Lab aims to boost mid-sized companies' marketing efforts
articles.author: The Business Journals
articles.summary: A local startup introduces digital marketing services for mid-market companies. These services utilize AI agents to provide a lower cost solution.

articles.title: ‘I love this stuff!' customers rave about No Pong Natural Deodorant — and it costs less than $10
articles.author: SEO Journalist
articles.summary: No Pong Natural Deodorants offers a range of natural deodorants including Original, Bicarb Free, and Vegan formulas, priced at $9.95. The deodorants feature natural ingredients, are eco-friendly with plastic-free packaging, and come in various scents like Spicy Chai and citrusy Original. They also offer a subscription service where deodorants are discounted to $8.95 per month.

articles.title: GeForce NOW: RTX 5080 Servers Unleash Cloud Gaming!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nvidia has upgraded its GeForce NOW service with RTX 5080-level servers, significantly boosting performance with higher frame rates and faster load times. This upgrade allows gamers to play graphically demanding games at maximum settings without high-end hardware. Nvidia also focused on reducing latency via improvements to Nvidia's Reflex technology, combined with optimized data center networking, is critical components of this upgrade.

articles.title: For Easy Weeknight Meals, Ditch the Cans and Open the Jar
articles.author: Kersten Rettig
articles.summary: Tonnino has launched a new product: jarred Wild Caught Silver Salmon, available exclusively at Whole Foods in North Texas. This salmon, sourced from Alaskan waters, is available in varieties like Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Rosemary with Smoked Olive Oil, and Garlic and Dill, offering a premium alternative to canned salmon.

articles.title: Milkless milk? We came to taste
articles.summary: Strauss has launched CowFree, a high-tech dairy alternative. The product is made with BLG protein and is described as revolutionary.

articles.title: Netizens are going
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Google launched a new update to its service last month.

articles.title: Woolworths unveils innovative Ballito Food Market, setting new standards for grocery shopping
articles.author: Independent online
articles.summary: Woolworths has launched its new Ballito Food Market on the KwaZulu-Natal North Coast. This project aims to redefine the retail landscape and follows the openings of flagship stores in Durbanville and Tygervalley.

articles.title: What's that being built next to Breton Village in Grand Rapids? It's a fast-growing chain
articles.author: Michigan Live
articles.summary: Tommy's Express is constructing a new car wash location at the corner of Breton Road and Burton Street in Grand Rapids. EV Construction, based in Holland, is prepping the site at 1970 Breton Road SE for the construction.

articles.title: This Octopus Useless Box is the most adorable pointless gadget ever made
articles.author: Popkin
articles.summary: ROBOTSZ created the Octopus Useless Box, a handmade gadget that opens when a lever is pressed. A grumpy octopus then emerges and closes the box by pushing a random lever.

articles.title: Microsoft just dropped its Store fees for Windows developers
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Microsoft is now enabling independent developers to distribute their applications through the Microsoft Store without any charges. This change provides a new option for developers using the platform.

articles.title: SK hynix begins supplying mobile NAND for ondevice AI
articles.author: Jo He-rim
articles.summary: SK hynix has begun supplying its ZUFS 4.1 mobile NAND solution, designed to enhance on-device AI capabilities in smartphones. ZUFS 4.1 improves OS speed and data management, reducing app launch times and enhancing error-handling compared to previous versions. This solution, developed in collaboration to optimize Android OS, is expected to see expanded applications.

articles.title: LG installs giant transparent OLED billboard in Tokyo
articles.author: 남들보다 앞서가는 주식정보 채널
articles.summary: LG Electronics installed a 380-inch transparent OLED signage display at NEWoMan TAKANAWA in Tokyo. This display offers customers an innovative experience by blending digital content with the real world.

articles.title: Don't Mistake Advancements for Improvement: Lessons from GPT5's Rollback
articles.author: Joel Hron
articles.summary: Thomson Reuters evaluates new LLMs for integration into products like CoCounsel Legal and Deep Research, focusing on real-world use and accuracy in long documents. They prioritize consistency and transparent citations, ensuring the AI delivers trustworthy results for legal professionals. They also design their products to abstract complexity away.

articles.title: What's viral Nano Banana' AI trend? Check how to create 3D image for free in 7 easy steps
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Nano Banana AI, an advanced digital tool using artificial intelligence, has been introduced for designing, modeling, and visualizing 3D figurines. It automates design generation with AI, producing realistic 3D models quickly. Users can refine their designs through simple text prompts after starting with template models.

articles.title: 2026 MG ZS Essence Turbo review
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: MG is launching the MG ZS Essence Turbo, a new variant of the ZS range, which is expected to be the 'just right' variant for small SUV buyers in 2025. It builds on the new-generation ZS improvements with a more agreeable price and a punchier powertrain, with a 54% boost in power and a 96% increase in torque for an additional $2000.

articles.title: Shark's new cleaning gadget is a 'game changer' for parents and pet owners
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Shark has launched the StainForce Cordless Stain-Destroying Spot Cleaner, priced at £169.99. This portable cleaning device features a handheld cleaning wand with a swappable cleaning head for targeted stain removal and includes Rinse and Go technology for easy cleaning. Initial customer reviews are positive, highlighting its effectiveness on fresh spills and stains.

articles.title: Budweiser to Reward Consumers in Promo
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Budweiser is launching a promotional campaign to reward its consumers. This initiative likely involves new incentives or features designed to engage customers.

articles.title: NB Inaugurates N5bn New Automated Facility in Ogun
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: NB inaugurated a new N5bn automated facility in Ogun. This new facility likely represents an expansion or improvement in NB's production capabilities.

articles.title: Zong unveils OZGPT, smarter digital companion for everyone
articles.summary: Zong has launched OZGPT, a new conversational AI service accessible via SMS, USSD, IVR, Web, and a dedicated application. The service offers features like instant answers, a scheduler, translation, local language support, screenshot-based responses, and AI-powered photo stylization and is available to Zong customers through daily, weekly, and monthly subscription plans.

articles.title: 27 Cozy Loungewear Items You'll Want For Cold Weather
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Printfresh offers flannel turkey pajamas for luxurious lounging. Disney Store features Mickey Mouse waffle lounge pants and matching tops. BoxLunch provides Totoro straight leg sweatpants. COMFY presents an original wearable blanket. Anthropologie offers lounge sweater pants with matching tops. Torrid has a hooded lounge cardigan, while Hanes offers comfy tank and pants sets. Dearfoams provides teddy bear slippers. Amazon sells various sets, robes, and slippers.

articles.title: Olay redefines skincare for Indian women with Yami Gautam Dhar
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Olay, a brand under Procter & Gamble India, has launched its new 'Olay 7-in-1 Serum' and 'Olay 7-in-1 Gel Moisturiser'. These products target seven signs of aging and aim to provide a simplified, science-backed anti-aging solution at an accessible price point for Indian women.

articles.title: What is NVIDIA and What Does It Do in Laptops?
articles.summary: NVIDIA GPUs power a range of laptops, including the ASUS ROG Zephyrus G16 with GeForce RTX 4070, offering features like ray tracing and DLSS for enhanced gaming and creative performance.  NVIDIA also optimizes laptops for creative professionals through its Studio program, exemplified by models like the HP ZBook Studio 16 G9, improving rendering times and visual accuracy in applications like Adobe Premiere Pro and Blender.

articles.title: New Chick-fil-A restaurant opens on New Design Road
articles.author: Frederick News-Post
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A has opened a new restaurant on New Design Road in the Frederick area. The restaurant debuted on Wednesday.

articles.title: AI-Powered Car Cover Launched by CarCover.com for Chevrolet Models
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: CarCover.com has launched a new line of car covers for Chevrolet vehicles, utilizing advanced AI technology to simulate and enhance fit and durability. The new covers are designed for specific Chevrolet models like Corvette and Silverado and address common issues like sagging and moisture leaks by incorporating multi-layer fabrics such as Gold Shield 5L and Silver Shield 3L.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy F17 5G launched with 5,000mAh battery and 50MP camera, price starts at Rs 13,999
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy F17 5G smartphone in India, featuring a 6.7-inch display, Exynos 1330 processor, and a 50MP camera setup. The device is available in three RAM variants and two colors, starting at Rs 13,999, with cashback offers and no-cost EMI options available across retail stores, Samsung.com, and Flipkart.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy F17 With AMOLED Display And One UI 7 Launched In India: Price, Specs
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy F17, a new affordable Android phone in India. The phone features an AMOLED display, a triple camera system, and is powered by an Exynos 1330 chipset. It will be available starting next week, with prices starting at Rs 14,499.

articles.title: Nothing OS 4.0 confirmed to launch soon with big changes: here's what to expect
articles.author: gizmochina
articles.summary: Nothing is preparing to launch Nothing OS 4.0, a major update based on Android 16, for its phones. The Nothing Phone will be the first device to receive the stable update, with a gradual rollout planned for other eligible devices. Additionally, Nothing is developing a program for Nothing Phone users, potentially involving smartphone upgrades.

articles.title: LG Introduces an Orchestra of Ai Appliances at Ifa Berlin, Showcasing a Symphony of Smarter Living
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: LG Electronics introduced its future smart living vision. This vision centers around innovative AI Appliances.

articles.title: NetworkNewsAudio Announces Audio Press Release (APR) on Transformation of Hospitality ...
articles.author: Investor Brand Network
articles.summary: NetworkNewsAudio announced an audio press release featuring Nightfood Holdings Inc. (NGTF). The press release is titled 'Automation and AI Unlock New Value Across Global Service Industries'.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7 review: the best flip folding smartphone so far
articles.summary: Samsung has released the Galaxy Z Flip7, a flip-folding smartphone with a larger cover screen and inner display. It features an Exynos 2500 processor, 12GB of RAM, and runs Android 16 with One UI 8, including Galaxy AI tools. The Z Flip7 is available for purchase at Samsung.com, Harvey Norman, Currys and Amazon, starting at €1139.

articles.title: 31 Random Products To Buy If You Enjoy Spoiling Yourself
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Dossier introduced "Ambery Vanilla" perfume as an affordable alternative to YSL's Black Opium. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash containing niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for 24-hour hydration. Coco Wyo released a stress relief coloring book, and Levi's launched Cinch Baggy Jeans with an adjustable band. Beckham Hotel Collection introduced Bed Pillows to upgrade sleeping comfort.

articles.title: Google Gemini vs ChatGPT: Try free AI prompts to craft retro to modern images
articles.summary: Google Gemini and ChatGPT can generate images based on text prompts. Users can specify styles such as 'retro' or 'vintage' to create images with grainy textures and faded colors, differentiating from normal realistic outputs. The prompt's style is crucial in determining the final image's aesthetic.

articles.title: Dragonpass unveils AI-driven development strategy
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Dragonpass has announced a new AI-driven business strategy as a core element of its future development. This strategy aims to transform the company from a digital platform into an AI-driven travel and lifestyle platform.

articles.title: The Body Shop Passionfruit Range Review: Cooling Summer Skincare You'll Love
articles.summary: The Body Shop has launched its Refreshing Passionfruit range in India, designed for the summer months. The range includes a body scrub, a refreshing shower gel, and a lightweight body yogurt, all featuring a tropical passionfruit fragrance and designed to leave skin smooth, hydrated and revived. The body yogurt contains menthol, providing a cooling effect.

articles.title: H&M marks foray in beauty segment in India
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: H&M is launching its H&M Beauty concept across its stores and online. The launch is scheduled for October 2nd.

articles.title: Global Mofy AI Launches New Website Domain to Strengthen Global AI Brand Identity
articles.author: GLOBAL MOFY AI LIMITED
articles.summary: Global Mofy AI Limited has launched its new corporate website, www.globalmofy.ai. This reflects their global expansion strategy and integration of artificial intelligence. The company has retired its previous website.

articles.title: Rezolve Ai Launches Visual Search, Replacing Keyword Search with Conversational Commerce
articles.author: Rezolve AI Ltd
articles.summary: Rezolve Ai, a strategic partner of Microsoft and Google, launched Visual Search, a new AI-powered feature. Visual Search enables consumers to point their phone camera at an item and instantly search across a Rezolve-enabled retailer's catalog, replacing traditional keyword search with Conversational Commerce.

articles.title: 29 Items That'll Make You Think 'Is This Witchcraft?'
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff launched a new "Sqeezy" sponge set, designed to work with their viral cleaning paste. NYX introduced Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Stain, offering a 2-in-1 lip product. Ninja released a new portable Crispi Air Fryer, which allows cooking and eating from the same container. There is also smudge-correcting clear nail polish introduced that corrects smudged manicures.

articles.title: Gogo Maweni Congratulates Jelly Babie on Opening Her Beauty Salon: 'I'm Super Proud of You'
articles.author: Mbali Tebele
articles.summary: Jelly Babie launched 'For The Babies Beauty Salon' in September 2025, as announced by Gogo Maweni. Other celebrities also launched businesses, including Lerato Nxumalo's clothing business in July 2025, Elaine's Pilates studio in August 2025, and Londie London's beauty salon, also in August 2025, which will feature her own hair brand.

articles.title: Juventus and PETRONAS Lubricants International come together!
articles.author: Juventus Football Club
articles.summary: Juventus and PETRONAS Lubricants International (PLI) have initiated a collaboration. A key element of this partnership is the launch of the PETRONAS Lubricants International Skybox at the Allianz Stadium, offering an immersive game experience for guests.

articles.title: Rezolve Ai Launches Visual Search, Replacing Keyword Search with Conversational Commerce
articles.author: Rezolve AI Ltd
articles.summary: Rezolve Ai launched Visual Search, an AI-powered capability allowing consumers to search a retailer's catalog by pointing their phone camera at any item. This Conversational Commerce interface presents results with contextual prompts and integrates with Brain Commerce & Brain Checkout for personalized recommendations and one-tap checkout, available across mobile, web, and in-store tools.

articles.title: Elevating home entertainment:
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: TCL has launched its 2025 QD-Mini LED lineup, including the C7K and C8K models, in Pakistan. These TVs feature QD-Mini LED display technology and Audio by Bang & Olufsen for enhanced visual and auditory experiences. The new TVs are available at TCL flagship stores and authorized retailers across Pakistan.

articles.title: 75 jobs created as new McDonald's opens in Derbyshire town
articles.author: Lucy Ball
articles.summary: McDonald's has opened a new 77-seater restaurant in Buxton, creating 75 jobs. The restaurant incorporates McDonald's 'Convenience of the Future' program, featuring a new layout, the latest technology, dedicated areas for different order methods, and an improved kitchen design to enhance speed and efficiency for both customers and couriers, including optimized drive-thru and click & collect services.

articles.title: What's that being built next to Breton Village in Grand Rapids? It's a fast-growing chain
articles.author: Ehren Wynder
articles.summary: Tommy's Express is constructing a new car wash location at Breton Road and Burton Street in Grand Rapids. The company also revealed its 'World Model' car wash, a smaller, modular concept designed for small towns and downtown areas, which can be built in as little as four months. Customers can use the Tommy's Express app to register their vehicles and skip the lines.

articles.title: Nykaa's Global Reach: Celebrating a UK Debut with Kay Beauty
articles.author: Mumbai
articles.summary: Nykaa is launching its in-house brand, Kay Beauty, in the UK market through Space NK, marking its expansion into global markets. The launch will be celebrated with an event in London on September 11th, attended by key opinion leaders and beauty executives.

articles.title: 75 jobs created as McDonald's opens in Buxton
articles.author: Lucy Ball
articles.summary: McDonald's has opened a new 77-seater restaurant in Buxton featuring sustainable materials and creating 75 jobs. The restaurant incorporates McDonald's 'Convenience of the Future' program with a new layout, dedicated courier area, and improved car park to enhance customer experience and efficiency.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers go wild as supermarket brings back £1.79 Snow Fairy ‘Lush dupe' and people say it ‘smells so good'
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Aldi has relaunched its Lacura Sweet Angel shower gel, a £1.79 'dupe' of Lush's Snow Fairy, which costs £24. Shoppers are excited about the return of this affordable alternative, praising its similar candy floss scent. Lush also launches its Snow Fairy products line.

articles.title: Give Customers What They Don't Know They Want
articles.author: David Malcolm
articles.summary: Cal West Apartments is introducing new services to enhance tenant experience. They are bringing Hawaiian shave-ice machines to properties, offering extra-large washing machines in laundry rooms, and investing in green measures like double-paned windows and smart irrigation. These initiatives are aimed at creating community, providing convenience, and promoting environmental consciousness among tenants.

articles.title: SK hynix starts supplying high-performance mobile NAND
articles.author: 재개발 재건축 추천매물 스터디
articles.summary: SK hynix Inc. has begun supplying its ZUFS 4.1 solution, a high-performance NAND flash memory for mobile devices. Mass production began in July 2025. The new ZUFS 4.1 improves operating system speed, enhances data management efficiency, reduces read performance degradation, and cuts app launch times.

articles.title: The Best Shaving Cream We Tested: Flamingo, Gillette, Fur, Athena Club
articles.author: Maggie Horton
articles.summary: The article presents a review and evaluation of 21 popular shaving creams. Testers assessed factors like consistency, effectiveness, lather, and overall impact on skin. Favorable products facilitated smooth razor glide and incorporated soothing ingredients like aloe vera and almond oil to hydrate and improve skin appearance while minimizing irritation.

articles.title: LG Introduces an Orchestra of Ai Appliances at Ifa Berlin, Showcasing a Symphony of Smarter Living
articles.summary: LG Electronics introduced its AI Appliances Orchestra and AI Home Solution at IFA Berlin 2025, aiming to create intelligent and adaptive homes. The system, powered by the ThinQ ON smart hub, integrates AI-powered services for unified management, while ThinQ UP offers software updates and ThinQ Care provides proactive maintenance and troubleshooting.

articles.title: This $16 Product Cured My Itchy, Flaky Scalp
articles.author: Essence Gant
articles.summary: Nizoral anti-dandruff shampoo, formulated with ketoconazole, is presented as an effective over-the-counter solution for dandruff and scalp fungus. User reviews highlight its ability to eliminate dandruff and reduce itching, with some users experiencing significant improvements after just a few uses. It is recommended to follow up with a hydrating shampoo and conditioner due to the potential for dryness.

articles.title: I Tried Everything For My Dandruff And This Drugstore Shampoo Was The Only Thing That Worked
articles.author: Essence Gant
articles.summary: Nizoral anti-dandruff shampoo is formulated with ketoconazole and is marketed as an over-the-counter solution for dandruff and scalp fungus. User reviews suggest that it is highly effective in eliminating dandruff, reducing itching, and controlling oily scalp, with many users expressing satisfaction after trying various other remedies without success. Though it might cause dryness, it is recommended to pair it with hydrating shampoo and conditioner.

articles.title: Perion Launches 'SODA' – Next Generation AI-Powered Supply-Side Technology for Web and DOOH Designed to Increase Revenue for Publishers, and Reduce Waste for Advertisers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perion Network Ltd. launched SODA, an AI-powered suite of solutions for publishers. SODA features a next-generation AI algorithm for Supply Path Optimization (SPO) designed to maximize efficiency and monetization across every ad impression.

articles.title: Save on Protein: Don't Be Fooled by Slick Packaging
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: Mini Babybel has a 'protein'-branded cheese that meets the Australian and New Zealand rules of being labelled as a 'source' of protein, because it has 5 grams of protein per serving. Research suggests black conveys high-quality or 'premium' products, a perfect match for foods marketed as 'functional' or 'performance-boosting'. Processed protein bars typically provide between 6-8g of protein per $1 spent.

articles.title: Burger King teams up with Gordon Ramsay to launch wagyu burger
articles.author: Cara Houlton
articles.summary: Burger King has collaborated with Gordon Ramsay to introduce a new £11 wagyu burger made with 100% British wagyu beef. The burger is available nationwide for a limited time and is promoted through a new campaign featuring Ramsay.

articles.title: 7 Best New Aldi Home Essentials Hitting Shelves This Week — Best Life
articles.author: Leah Barrett
articles.summary: Aldi is introducing several new home essential products. These include Kirkton House Pumpkin Door Mats ($6.99), Harvest Decor Pillows ($9.99), Joie Wool Dryer Balls ($12.99), Kirkton House Peel and Stick Wall Tiles ($9.99), Crofton Swedish Dishcloths ($4.99), Kirkton House Washable Play Rug Racetracks ($19.99), and Ambiano Handheld Mini Irons ($9.99), all with unique features and benefits.

articles.title: Mini Cooper 5 Door – Different ways of being Mini
articles.author: Guilherme Marques
articles.summary: Mini, owned by BMW, has introduced two new concept cars in collaboration with Deus Ex Machina: 'The Skeg', an electric John Cooper Works inspired by surfing, and 'The Machina', inspired by motorsport. Additionally, the Mini Cooper 5 Door is now available with a three-cylinder turbo 1.5 litre engine, making 156 horse power.

articles.title: Boost Organic Growth with Blazly's SEO Toolkit — Now 70% Off
articles.author: Techrepublic Academy
articles.summary: Blazly SEO offers a lifetime subscription to its platform for $59.99, which automates content strategy, execution, and optimization. The platform generates expert-level articles, includes tools for humanizing AI-generated text, plagiarism checks, and SEO scoring to help businesses improve their search engine rankings.

articles.title: Shoppers love this €8 gadget that cleans washing in less than 10 minutes
articles.author: JOE
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a portable mini washing machine for €8.89. This USB-powered gadget is designed for washing small items like underwear and socks and is marketed towards travelers, students, and busy professionals, emphasizing its portability and energy-saving potential.

articles.title: Fife baker unveils first ever app with free yum yum offer on launch day
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: Bayne's, a family bakery, has launched its first mobile app to celebrate its 70th anniversary. The app includes a digital loyalty scheme and offers a free drink or treat after the first order. To celebrate the launch on September 11, Bayne's is offering a free yum yum to anyone who downloads the app in a Bayne's shop.

articles.title: Switch 2対応の512GB/1TB microSD Expressカード、Nextorageから
articles.summary: Nextorage has confirmed the compatibility of its microSD Express card with the Nintendo Switch 2. This testing suggests the availability or upcoming release of Nextorage's microSD Express card for use with the new Nintendo console.

articles.title: SK hynix starts supply of new high-performance NAND solution
articles.author: 강윤승
articles.summary: SK hynix has begun supplying its new ZUFS 4.1 NAND solution, designed to enhance performance in smartphones with on-device AI. This new product features zone storage technology and sequential data writing, resulting in a 47 percent reduction in AI app launch times. SK hynix aims to meet customer needs with timely NAND solutions and strengthen AI memory sector competitiveness.

articles.title: Genstore Ranks #1 Product of the Day on Product Hunt
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Genstore launched an AI-native e-commerce platform that simplifies online selling for small and medium-sized businesses.  The platform uses AI agents to assist with tasks like store building and marketing, and features integrations with marketplaces like Amazon and Shopify. Recent updates include enhancements to streamline operations and scalability for merchants.

articles.title: Amazon's Luna cloud gaming service gets limited Android rollout
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Amazon has updated the compatibility list for its Luna cloud gaming service. Initially available on Fire TV, PC, Mac, and iOS, Luna's compatible devices and browsers list has been revised, with specific details available in the full news article.

articles.title: Tineco FLOOR ONE S9 Scientist Wins Gold at Global Product Technology Innovation Awards 2025
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Tineco announced the FLOOR ONE S9 Scientist, a new generation of smart floor washers, that received the All-Scenario Cleaning Innovation Gold Award at IFA 2025. The FLOOR ONE S9 Scientist features StreakFree Technology, HydroBurst Technology, FlashDry Self-Cleaning System, and provides up to 75 minutes of runtime. The product is engineered for convenience and efficiency.

articles.title: Katrina Kaif's Kay Beauty Becomes First Indian Beauty Brand To Be Launched At Britain's Space NK
articles.author: NDTV Lifestyle Desk
articles.summary: Kay Beauty, actress Katrina Kaif's beauty label, has launched in the UK via Space NK, marking the retailer's first Indian-founded brand. The launch includes about 197 products across complexion, lips, and eyes, with accessible price points. This expansion follows a prior launch in Dubai in May 2024.

articles.title: AI branding is growing up – with expressive brand worlds taking the wheel
articles.author: Ritupriya Basu
articles.summary: Jupi, an AI-powered decision-making operating system, aimed for a brand identity challenging the conventional AI aesthetic. Picco, an AI-powered platform automating tasks for sales teams, was branded as a companion with illustrations of outdated office tools. Robin, an AI-powered platform reimagining legal work, was rebranded with a focus on humanity and innovation, utilizing illustrated landscapes.

articles.title: Web browsers can now be smart home devices and this browser is the first
articles.author: Mahnoor Faisal
articles.summary: Opera introduced a Smart Home feature for Opera GX, allowing the browser to interact with smart home devices. The Smart Home feature utilizes an MQTT API and browser extensions to connect with smart home hubs like Home Assistant, Homebridge, and Node-RED. Users can set up custom automations to control the browser and home environment.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Home Of The 'Full Pour Pils,' Kent Falls Brewing Opens Its Taproom In Northford This Weekend
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Kent Falls Brewing is opening a new taproom in Northford, featuring their unique Full Pour Pils. The grand opening will include food trucks and special hours, inviting the community to celebrate this addition.

articles.title: Tiny11's free update strips down Windows 11 for Windows 10 fans
articles.author: Mark Hachman
articles.summary: Ntdevlabs has released a substantial update to Tiny11 Builder. The Tiny11 Builder service takes a Windows 11 ISO and removes built-in apps, telemetry, and ads, aiming to provide a less bloated experience for users transitioning from Windows 10.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy F17 5G with Exynos processor and triple rear camera
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy F17 5G smartphone in India on September 11, 2025, targeting budget buyers. The phone features a 6.7-inch FHD+ Super AMOLED display, a 50MP main camera, a 5,000 mAh battery with 25W charging, and is powered by an Exynos 1330 processor. It is available in multiple variants and colors, starting at ₹13,999, and is sold through retail stores, Samsung, and Flipkart.

articles.title: Shoppers left divided after M&S reveal new caramel sauce with VERY controversial ingredient
articles.author: ALICE WADE
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) has introduced several new food products, including a Marmite infused caramel spread, Pecan and Salted Caramel Blondies containing Marmite, Peppermint Bark, Peanut Butter Reindeer, Shortbread Christmas Trees, Chocolate and Cinnamon Tortilla Rolls, and Maple Bacon Combo Mix crisps.  Additionally, M&S is re-releasing its Gingerbread and White Chocolate cookies and debuting Lamington cakes in two variations: Chocolate and Coconut, and Caramelised Biscuit.

articles.title: China Talc Powder Factory: Key Innovations from the China Powder Show 2025
org: Hebei Runhuabang New Material Technology Co., Ltd
articles.summary: Hebei Runhuabang New Material Technology Co., Ltd. is showcasing its high-quality talc powder at the China Powder Show 2025. The company's talc powder is engineered for use in plastics, paints, ceramics, and personal care products, emphasizing its versatility and commitment to quality and innovation.

articles.title: Defence Holdings PLC (LON: ALRT) has launched its first sovereign AI product
articles.summary: Defence Technologies, a subsidiary of Defence Holdings PLC, has announced the launch of its first AI product, Project Ixian, designed for use in Information Operations. The product's name is Project Ixian.

articles.title: The next Nvidia? Why smart money is betting on Broadcom
articles.summary: Broadcom received a $10 billion order from OpenAI to co-design custom AI chips (XPUs). Broadcom is facilitating a shift in the AI industry towards custom AI accelerators and aims to generate $60-90 billion in revenue by fiscal 2027 from this business. This contrasts with Nvidia's dominance in general-purpose GPUs.

articles.title: Nykaa enters UK market with Kay Beauty launch at Space NK
articles.author: ETRetail Desk
articles.summary: Nykaa has launched its in-house brand, Kay Beauty, in the UK market through Space NK. This expansion follows Nykaa's previous move into the GCC region via its omnichannel platform 'Nysaa'. The House of Nykaa Beauty portfolio reports a significant GMV run rate and serves millions of customers.

articles.title: LG to Introduce Advanced Ai-powered Living With 'lg Ai Home' at Ifa 2025
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: LG Electronics will present its AI-powered living vision at IFA 2025. The presentation includes the 'LG AI Appliances Orchestra'.

articles.title: Androidify: With Google's gen AI tool, users can turn their selfie into fun Android bot
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Google provides the 'Androidify' app.

articles.title: Bolton Council to decide on jet washes for Harwood Morrisons
articles.author: Eoin McCaul
articles.summary: A service station plans to install three new jet wash bays at Lea Gate in Harwood, across from Morrisons. Bolton Council's planning committee will decide on the application, which has faced objections from local residents concerning noise, light pollution, and increased traffic. The planning officer's report recommends approval, subject to conditions like covering the jet washes and moving floodlights to mitigate noise and spray.

articles.title: How to make video and voice calls on Google Nest Hub and Nest Hub Max
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Google's Nest Hub and Nest Hub Max smart displays provide various useful features. These devices function as excellent smart home hubs and are particularly helpful for following recipes.

articles.title: Now you can make Zoom calls on Google Nest Hub Max
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Google announced that users can now make Zoom calls on the Nest Hub Max smart screen device. The Zoom app on Nest Hub Max is currently in preview.

articles.title: What is Sky Q, how much does it cost and how can I get it
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Sky is offering Sky Q, its premium product, as the default option for new Sky TV customers. Existing Sky+ users can upgrade to Sky Q at reduced rates.

articles.title: Sky Q tips and tricks: Getting the most from Fluid Viewing and your Sky Q box
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Sky offers Sky Q, a TV viewing service with settings designed to enhance user experience.

articles.title: Amazon's Luna cloud gaming service is now available on Android
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Amazon's Luna cloud gaming service is now accessible on Android devices, expanding its availability to a new platform.

articles.title: LG to Introduce Advanced Ai-powered Living With 'lg Ai Home' at Ifa 2025
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its LG AI Home solution at IFA 2025, showcasing new AI-powered appliances designed for European lifestyles. The new products include AI-enabled refrigerators, washing machines, dryers, and vacuum cleaners, all focused on energy efficiency, personalization, and seamless integration into modern homes.

articles.title: Baidu Unveils Ernie X1.1 Deep Thinking Model, Claims It Outperforms DeepSeek R1
articles.author: gizmochina
articles.summary: Baidu has launched Ernie X1.1, a major upgrade to its Ernie X1 AI model, built on the Ernie 4.5 foundation. Baidu claims the new model rivals GPT-5 and DeepSeek R1 in performance. Ernie X1.1 is now available via Baidu Cloud, the Ernie Bot website, and the Wenxiaoyan app.

articles.title: Tony Bianco expands Made To Order shoe service to website orders
articles.author: Philippa Tonkin
articles.summary: Tony Bianco has relaunched its "Made To Order" custom shoe service, now available online after initially launching in-store. Customers can choose heel height, styles, colors, and fabrics to create personalized shoes, priced from $179.95, with handcrafted production taking six to eight weeks.

articles.title: 32 Must-Have Beauty Products You're Missing Out On
articles.author: Jordan Grigsby
articles.summary: L'Oréal introduces a magenta hair dye for dark hair that requires no pre-lightening. Mane Club launches One Hit Wonder, a 10-in-1 hair spray, and a variety pack of hair masks. Haus Labs by Lady Gaga releases a foundation with a serum-like texture that is receiving positive reviews for its skin-matching abilities.

articles.title: Rappi presents a new bet to help companies use Digital Marketing
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Rappi is launching 'Brands by Rappi,' a new service designed to enable brands to connect more directly with their consumers.

articles.title: 南昌市雅姿日用品有限公司成立 注册资本10万人民币_手机网易网
articles.author: 和讯网
articles.summary: 南昌市雅姿日用品有限公司 has been established with a registered capital of 100,000 RMB. The company's business scope includes the manufacturing and sale of daily-use products, stationery, pigments, beauty accessories, and office supplies.

articles.title: These 34 Things Are Just Too Good To Gatekeep
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: Kinfield launched Golden Hour bug spray, an alternative to DEET. Sauberkugel introduced a cleaning ball for purses, while Hairbrella launched a satin-lined product to protect hair from rain and humidity. Several other companies have introduced new products, including Doughp's variety pack of cookie dough and Marshmallow Whip Maker that'll totally elevate your nightly skincare routine.

articles.title: Food Picks: Jie Bakery launches cafe with soft baguette in Outram
articles.author: Hedy Khoo
articles.summary: Jie Bakery has opened a new retail and cafe outlet in Outram Road, expanding beyond its Tai Seng flagship. To mark the opening, they have launched Jie Soft Baguette, a hybrid between French baguette and traditional bread. The new outlet also offers the highlight Chicken Curry with Bread.

articles.title: Aldi Just Brought Back Their Viral $27 Bread Oven That Rivals a Le Creuset Style Nearly 11x More Expensive
articles.author: Kenn C. Bivins
articles.summary: Aldi has reintroduced its Crofton Bread Dome, an enameled cast iron bread oven available in blue or white, priced at $26.99. This product is presented as a more affordable alternative to Le Creuset's bread oven, which costs around $300, offering similar functionality for baking bread. The Crofton Bread Dome is compatible with various cooktops and oven-safe up to 482°F.

articles.title: Affirming Promotion of Oral Hygiene, Dental Care
articles.author: Featured
articles.summary: Nature's Renaissance International (NRI) has launched UATD EYI Toothpastes, including a charcoal variant for adults with herbal extracts and strawberry/grape-flavored options for children. These toothpastes are locally formulated and manufactured in Nigeria, utilizing Africa's natural resources, and represent a breakthrough in dental care and African innovation.

articles.title: Aldi's New $5 Kitchen Tool Makes Preparing Fall Vegetables a Breeze
articles.author: Julie Andrews
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the Crofton Squash Scoop, a new $4.99 kitchen tool designed to simplify the preparation of fall vegetables like squash and pumpkins. This dishwasher-safe scoop will be available in black and jade green handles starting September 17th, as a limited-time fall item.

articles.title: FDG Web Marks 25th Anniversary, Defying Digital Agency Lifespan with Down-to-Earth Solutions and U.S.-Based Team
articles.summary: FDG Web is now offering new AI integration services to clients. These services include designing AI chatbots to reduce support overhead, building intelligent automation and workflows to improve efficiency, and creating custom applications more efficiently. FDG Web aims to help clients navigate and leverage AI for business improvements.

articles.title: Youtube Brandcast: New unskippable format launched, 30s TVCs ‘least effective'
articles.author: Hal Crawford
articles.summary: Youtube introduced a 60-second unskippable ad format called Youtube Select, allowing for richer storytelling. Other product announcements included a connected TV (CTV) full-screen 'masthead' ad format for the Youtube homepage, a 'shoppable' product for CTV and an ability to insert ads at emotional 'peak points' in videos using AI-driven analysis called Gemini Peak Points.

articles.title: Why You Shouldn't Use Laundry Detergent Pods
articles.author: Raj Punjabi
articles.summary: Patric Richardson, known as 'The Laundry Evangelist,' has launched his own line of laundry products. He recommends using laundry soap or detergent made for baby clothes, while advising against the use of pods.

articles.title: ControlZ simplifies refurbished phone purchase, and Instagram lands on iPad
articles.author: Vishal Mathur
articles.summary: ControlZ has launched its first offline experience store in Gurugram, emphasizing quality checks and customer trust for renewed smartphones. Apple announced the iPhone Air, a thinner model with advanced features, and the iPhone 17 Pro with design and camera upgrades. OpenAI is introducing parental controls to ChatGPT, offering options for parents to manage their children's interactions with the chatbot.

articles.title: 3 ways I effortlessly save storage space on my Windows 11 PC
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Windows 11 offers Storage Sense, a feature that automates the removal of space-hogging files. It allows users to install apps and games directly to an external HDD or SSD. Additionally, Windows 11 provides Cleanup recommendations for quick cleanup of temporary and unused files.

articles.title: SK hynix Begins Supplying Mobile NAND Solution ZUFS 4.1
articles.author: Bennington Banner
articles.summary: A company has begun mass production and supply of a high-performance NAND solution to the mobile market. This new product significantly improves sustained performance and reduces app launch time by 45%, specifically designed for on-device AI and large-scale data applications.

articles.title: I can't use my Google TV without this app
articles.author: Pankil Shah
articles.summary: Projectivity Launcher is introduced as an alternative to the default Google TV interface. It offers features like ad removal, customization options, faster navigation, auto-app launch, and parental controls. A premium version is available for additional features like custom icons and display profiles.

articles.title: SM Supermalls celebrates 40th anniversary
articles.author: OMG
articles.summary: SM Supermalls is building new mall destinations, including SM Zamboanga, SM Sta. Rosa with an indoor garden, and SM Harrison Plaza. They are also upgrading existing malls like SM Megamall with a crystal rooftop garden and SM North Edsa with an air-conditioned rooftop Sky Garden.

articles.title: SK hynix starts supply of new high-performance NAND solution
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: SK hynix Inc. began supplying a new product on Thursday.

articles.title: New aquatic product center opens for business in Guangzhou
articles.author: Qiu Quanlin
articles.summary: Guangzhou Port Group constructed the Huangsha Aquatic Product Center. This center integrates a live seafood trading market, aquatic product logistics and distribution, and a chilled and frozen products market in Guangzhou.

articles.title: Can Robigus be the new crop guardian? This app tracks plant diseases globally
articles.author: Citrus County Chronicle
articles.summary: Braham Dhillon is demonstrating the app Robigus.

articles.title: Smart speakers and connected TVs redefining brand presence in GCC homes
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: Yango Yasmina, an AI-powered assistant, is emerging as an active participant in family life. It interacts with different members of the household, blurring the line between physical devices and brand presence.

articles.title: Microsoft puts last remnants of original Edge browser on life support
articles.author: The Register
articles.summary: Microsoft has deprecated legacy Edge developer tools and hosted web apps. These web components are being removed from its list of supported features.

articles.title: H&M Beauty Concept Makes Its Grand Debut in India
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: H&M Beauty Concept has made its debut in India. This launch introduces the H&M Beauty Concept to the Indian market.

articles.title: Singlife Philippines offers cheaper payment options for mobile app users
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Singlife Philippines has launched new features for its mobile app, including an annual payment option. These updates aim to enhance the user experience for Singlife customers.

articles.title: Digimon Story: Time Stranger Demo is Live on PC
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Bandai Namco is launching its new game, 'Digimon Story: Time Stranger' on October 3rd. A free demo containing the opening chapter is available for PC and will be available later for Xbox Series X/S and PS5, with player progress carrying over to the full release.

articles.title: Honor X9c review: Big battery and stunningly slim design made affordable
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: The Honor Xc features a big battery and stunningly slim design. It is positioned as an affordable product.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy F17 With AMOLED Display And One UI 7 Launched In India: Price, Specs
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy F17, a new affordable Android phone featuring an AMOLED display and a 5,000mAh battery. The device includes 6 OS upgrades.

articles.title: PicLumen Expands Creative Suite with New Text-to-Video and Image-to-Video Features
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A leading innovator in AI-driven visual content generation, has launched its next-generation , introducing Text-to-Video and Image-to-Video capabilities. These new features are designed to redefine video content production for individuals, brands, and creative teams.

articles.title: Tripla Inc. Marks Tenth Anniversary with AI-Driven Hospitality Launch and Exclusive Industry Gathering in Bangkok, Thailand
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Tripla Inc. is launching two new products: TriplaBook, a booking engine designed to increase direct hotel reservations, and TriplaBot, an AI-powered chatbot that facilitates instant bookings through messaging platforms. These products aim to improve customer experiences and operational efficiency in the hospitality industry.
